covata.rovers

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • covata.rovers.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Input stores the information of an input NASA file, i.e. the position Position of the upper right hand corner of the grid, and the list of rovers Rover it contains.
    Author:
    ceven

    • Constructor Detail

      • Input

        public Input(Position urCorner,
             java.util.LinkedHashMap<Rover,java.util.List<Move>> rovers)
        Initialize this with the position of the upper right corner of the grid and the list of rovers with initial position and direction
        Parameters:
        urCorner - the position Position of the upper right corner of the grid
        rovers - the list of rovers Rover

      • Input

        public Input(java.lang.String input)
        Initialize with an input string. Each line in the input string is assumed to be delimited by '\n'. The first element is the upper-right coordinates of the plateau, the lower-left coordinates are assumed to be 0,0. The is information pertaining to the rovers that have been deployed. Each rover has two lines of input. The first line gives the rover's position, and the second line is a series of instructions telling the rover how to explore the plateau.
        Parameters:
        input - the input string. Example: 5 5\n1 2 N\nLMLMLMLMM\n3 3 E\nMMRMMRMRRM
